channel.title: Windows 8 Install
channel.description: i just got windows 8 on my new lap top. I have BM on my desk top and the install was easy. however on windows 8 when i click the download it asks me what app i want to run it with. anyone know hot to get the BM install on to steam?

item.title: Windows 8 Install
item.dc:creator: beebop
item.description:
sersoft:

use chrome to download it, and make sure steam is installed before you install BM

Ok so i got it downloaded and installed and after the installer runs it will open and run the game, but now it doesnâ€™t show up in my steam Library.

I know this was the problem on W7 too, but i was able to fix that by retarting steam. Any ideas?
